title: Five Towns
description: There’s no compromising on the streets of Long Island.
quote: I’m not just gonna stand around and let that happen to nobody. Not in my town. Not in any of my Five Towns.
altHero: Johnny Chase smokes a cigarette in a warehouse
alt1: Chase chats with a delivery guy
alt2: Chase is emotional in the rain
alt3: Jamie-Lynn Sigler is emotional in the rain
alt4: Chase chats with friends in the street
